abilities.name: Stardust Song
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Jirachi from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to Jirachi.

attacks.name: Time Hollow
attacks.text: Choose a number of your opponent's Stage 1 or Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon up to the amount of Energy attached to Jirachi. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of those Pokémon and put those cards back into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Hard Crush
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

attacks.name: Mantle Bazooka
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

attacks.name: Deep Sea Swirl
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.

abilities.name: Psychic Float
abilities.text: If you have any Psychic Energy attached to your Active Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for that Pokémon is 0.

attacks.name: Double Leg Hammer
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Magical Trans
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Mismagius is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic Pulse
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Switch Cannon
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Switch Octillery with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ink Bomb
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Leap Frog
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a Water Pokémon on your Bench and switch it with your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Politoed is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Big Chorus
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Water Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Celebration Wind
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Shaymin from your hand onto your Bench, you may move as many Energy cards attached to your Pokémon as you like to any of your other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Bloom
attacks.text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Push Over
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Fighting Energy attached to Sudowoodo.

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.text: Remove from Torterra the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Paralyze Poison
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is also Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Launcher
attacks.text: Return 2 Water Energy attached to Blastoise to your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wing
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Repeating Drill
attacks.text: Flip 5 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Water Acceleration
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Floatzel. This power can't be used if Floatzel is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stream Pump
attacks.text: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, return an Energy card attached to Kingdra to your hand.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to Lanturn to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bulk Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, each of Lucario's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Heat Acceleration
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for up to 3 Fire Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Steamroll
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dynamic Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bebop Punch
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Energy Signal
abilities.text: When you attach a Grass Energy card or Psychic Energy card from your hand to Roserade during your turn, you may use this power. If you attach a Grass Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If you attach a Psychic Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Roserade is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Roserade.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Steelix by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Steel Swing
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Hot Snort
abilities.text: Once during your turn when you put Torkoal from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Tail Crush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Sunny Heal
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Cherrim is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Mean Look
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Speed Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Energy Crane
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Psychic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tag Team Boost
attacks.text: If Plusle is on your Bench, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Flare Bonus
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. Then, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Plusle does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Boost Gas
abilities.text: If Pupitar has any Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Pupitar is 0.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Pupitar.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Crimson Bull
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Tauros is now Confused.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tail Code
attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tail Smash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Reaction
attacks.text: You may switch Beldum with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Drawup Power
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Fin Smack
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mountain Eater
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Larvitar.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Larvitar does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Sharpshooting
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.text: Switch Natu with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Energy Healer
abilities.text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from you hand to 1 of your Pokémon, remove 1 damage counter from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.text: Onix can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Swing Around
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Chop
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Petal Dance
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. Roselia is now Confused.

attacks.name: Roost
attacks.text: Remove 4 damage counters from Spearow. Spearow can't retreat during your next turn.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mystifying Horns
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: Teddiursa does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Green Call
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.text: If this attack does any damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), remove 1 damage counter from Turtwig.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

attacks.name: Speed Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Weedle and put it onto Weedle. (This counts as evolving Weedle.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Double Attack
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Cheerleader's Cheer
rules: Draw 3 cards. Your opponent may draw a card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dual Ball
rules: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Emcee's Chatter
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, draw 3 cards. If tails, draw 2 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Energy Returner
rules: Search your discard pile for 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Engineer's Adjustments
rules: Discard an Energy card from your hand. Then. draw 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Good Rod
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. If tails, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Interviewer's Questions
rules: Look at the top 8 cards of your deck. Choose as many Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Judge
rules: Each player shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Life Herb
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: PlusPower
rules: During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 10 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Circulator
rules: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card on the Basic Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Super Scoop Up
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

attacks.name: Severe Poison
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Spray Splash
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dragon Steam
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Fire Pokémon in play, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 60.

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Lanturn's type is Water until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Lanturn is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Perfect Metal
abilities.text: Steelix can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Energy Stream
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Steelix.

attacks.name: Gaia Crush
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Darkness Howl
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding any Darkness Pokémon). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Power Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Megaton Tail
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.text: If Ursaring has any damage counters on it, each of Ursaring's attacks does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hammer Arm
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Detonation Spin
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND.

attacks.name: Thunder Fall
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND. This attack does 80 damage to each Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers (both yours and your opponent's). This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND.

attacks.name: Thunder Fall
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Entei & Raikou LEGEND. This attack does 80 damage to each Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers (both yours and your opponent's). This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt Spear
attacks.text: Raikou & Suicune LEGEND does 50 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness to this damage.

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: Remove 5 damage counters from Raikou & Suicune LEGEND.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt Spear
attacks.text: Raikou & Suicune LEGEND does 50 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness to this damage.

attacks.name: Aurora Gain
attacks.text: Remove 5 damage counters from Raikou & Suicune LEGEND.

attacks.name: Torrent Blade
attacks.text: Return 2 Water Energy attached to Suicune & Entei LEGEND to your hand. Choose one of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Torrent Blade
attacks.text: Return 2 Water Energy attached to Suicune & Entei LEGEND to your hand. Choose one of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 100 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
